package.name: Payment_Reembolso
package.summary: This is the cash on deluvery paument method.
package.description: It establishes different amount for the amount of the purchase. If it is minor that the Certain amount, the amount of the service will be a fixed value; if the amount is major that the Certain amount, the amount of the service will be a percentage of the same one. To do: Set from the control panel the fixed value, the value percentage and the Certain amount.
package.notes:
* Changes: set from control panel the "Certain amount", "low value" and "top value". Last these can be formed like fixed or percentages.
CHANGES: ->U app/code/local/Mage/Reembolso/Model/Quote.php ->U app/code/local/Mage/Reembolso/Model/Reembolso.php ->U app/code/local/Mage/Reembolso/etc/system.xml ->U app/code/local/Mage/Reembolso/etc/config.xml
